categories.desc: Major adversaries encountered throughout Pharloom. Defeating them marks your progress in Hollow Knight: Silksong.

items.description: Mossgrubs are enemies in Hollow Knight: Silksong. They are crawling, caterpillar-like creatures that are covered in spikes.
items.label: Mossgrub

items.description: They are enormous Mossgrubs with two horn-like spikes on their heads.
items.label: Massive Mossgrub

categories.label: Journal
